name: Speed Road
description:
Made with my two sons for the 2022 Kenney Gam Jam.  

The theme of the Jam was growth.  This is an auto runner/driver where you drive a car and collect coins to earn points.  You speed up over time and the faster you go the more points you earn.  Earn enough points and you upgrade to a bigger vehicle... but watch out, you thirst for GAS increases as the bigger your vehicle gets and the faster you go!

Use the up and down arrow keys to change lanes.
